submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, h: List[int], v: List[int]) -> int:
        vl = 1
        hl = 1
        h.sort(reverse=True)
        v.sort(reverse=True)
        cost = 0

        i = 0
        j = 0
        while i < len(h) and j < len(v):
            if h[i] > v[j]:
                cost += h[i] * vl
                hl += 1
                i += 1
            else: 
                cost += v[j] * hl
                vl += 1
                j += 1

        while i < len(h): 
            cost += h[i] * vl
            hl += 1
            i += 1

        while j < len(v): 
            cost += v[j] * hl
            vl += 1
            j += 1
        
        return cost
